body_html: I got this error too (and a couple other ones). At least in my case, it was caused by a different version of ffmpeg installed in my system, which produces slightly different output. The underlying problem is that this functionality relies on parsing the ffmpeg output to extract metadata (nb of frames and frame dimensions) but the output may differ between versions as well as between video files. Perhaps a more reliable way would be to use ffprobe to get the metadata.
